version_description:
- Animated clouds have been improved.
- Mooncast is now localized in german.

- Animated clouds have been improved.
- Mooncast is now localized in german.
The app is now available also in spanish and italian.
The app is now available also in spanish and italian.
Various improvements.
Various improvements.
Various graphical improvements.
Various graphical improvements.
Resolved an issue with the "2 days before new moon" notification.
Resolved an issue with the "2 days before new moon" notification.
Improved the widget for iOS 10.
Improved the widget for iOS 10.

The orientation correction for the southern hemisphere is now also performed in the widget.
Improved widget display for older versions of iOS.

The orientation correction for the southern hemisphere is now also performed in the widget.
Improved widget display for older versions of iOS.

- extended predictions up to the year 2030 !
- removed Facebook and Twitter integration (no longer supported in iOS 11)

- extended predictions up to the year 2030 !
- removed Facebook and Twitter integration (no longer supported in iOS 11)
Fixed an issue that would sometimes display the wrong moon phase on the day following a full moon.
Fixed an issue that would sometimes display the wrong moon phase on the day following a full moon.
When the screen is big enough, the day of the week is also printed in the forecast section.
When the screen is big enough, the day of the week is also printed in the forecast section.
Added support for the new Apple Watch complications.
Added support for the new Apple Watch complications.

- upgraded to iOS 13
- added support for dark mode

- upgraded to iOS 13
- added support for dark mode
- added a "Share" button.
- added a "Share" button.

minor UI improvements
the Watch app can now run without the iPhone

minor UI improvements
the Watch app can now run without the iPhone
- Mooncast now features various sizes of widgets for iOS 14.
- Mooncast now features various sizes of widgets for iOS 14.
- Mooncast now features various sizes of widgets for iOS 14.
- Mooncast now features various sizes of widgets for iOS 14.
Widget UI adjustments.
Widget UI adjustments.
Resolved an issue with the complications in the watch app.
Resolved an issue with the complications in the watch app.
In the widget, support was added for the southern hemisphere.
